programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -52kg, Men's -66kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's -52kg and Men's -66kg Finals took place on 28/07/2024 at the Champs-de-Mars Arena. At the Women's -52kg, Diyora Keldiyorova (UZB) claimed the gold, Distria Krasniqi (KOS) took the silver medal, and the two bronze medals were won by Amandine Buchard (FRA) and Larissa Pimenta (BRA). At the Men's -66kg, Hifumi Abe (JPN) won the Gold medal, while Willian Lima (BRA) took the Silver. The Bronze medals were claimed by Denis Vieru (MDA) and Gusman Kyrgyzbayev (KAZ).

programme.title: Original Fuel (Film)
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, athletes representing young republics have forged their own path to DIY training and Olympic success.

programme.title: Meet the entourage of Kayla Harrison, Mark McMorris and Toni-Ann Williams
programme.desc: Kayla Harrison (USA) x BFF Marti Malloy; Mark McMorris (CAN) x Physical Therapist; Toni-Ann Williams (JAM) x Cal Gymnastics Team "sisters"

programme.title: The Olympic spirit : Greek gift, the ancient games
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.3, Program 1 : The Olympic spirit : Greek gift, the ancient games.

programme.title: Athletes Under Fire - Episode 1: Yemen & Syria
programme.desc: Yemeni judo Olympian Ali Khousrof, and Syrian artistic gymnastics champion Ahmad Al Sawas, promote the power of sport in cities under siege.

programme.title: Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Kong (HKG) - Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout between Auriane Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Man Wai Vivian Kong (HKG) took place on 27/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Mallo-Breton took the Silver,and Kong took the Gold.

programme.title: Gala Exhibition - Figure Skating | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: To celebrate the end of the competition, the best skaters performed free of any constraints at the Gangneung Ice Arena on 25 February 2018.

programme.title: Gala exhibition - Figure Skating | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 20/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium.

programme.title: The first Mexican Olympic figure skater in 30 years | Winter Tracks
programme.desc: When he competes in next Olympic Winter Games, Donovan Carrillo will be the first figure skater from Mexico to do so in 30 years. In a country with barely any Olympic size rinks, he is an artist who believes figure skating has given him the perfect platform to express himself. He moved away from his hometown and family when he was 13. Living with his coach, Gregorio Núñez, a father-like figure, to further his training. Together, they have overcome huge obstacles including lack of resources, funding and recent COVID restrictions to finally qualify for the Games.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 7
programme.desc: Torvill and Dean reach ice dance perfection, gold for Surinam, Japanese swimming pool superiority, and the history of the photo finish.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 8
programme.desc: Olympic twins, the greatest gold medalist in gymnastics, the undefeated Kiwis, ice skating innovation and an unlikely Luxembourg gold.
